          <title>
            <string language="en">Wooden beam on a pivot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hölzerner Lichtstrahl auf einem Gelenk</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Faisceau en bois sur un pivot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Feixe de madeira em um pivô</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fascio di legno su un perno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ξύλινη ακτίνα σε έναν άξονα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Viga de madera en un pivote</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a three-meter wooden beam pivoted one meter from one end.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">beam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">centre of mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pivot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß ein 
Dreimeßinstrument hölzerner Lichtstrahl einen Meter von einem Ende 
schwenkte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que un faisceau en bois 
de trois-mètre a pivoté un mètre d'une extrémité.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que um feixe de madeira 
do três-medidor girou um medidor de uma extremidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che un fascio di 
legno del tre-tester ha imperniato un tester da un'estremità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ξύλινη ακτίνα 
τρεις-μετρητών που περιστρέφεται ένα μέτρο από ένα τέλος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que una viga de madera 
del tres-contador giró un contador a partir de un extremo.</string>
          </description>
